physical_appearance: This is a black slip dress with a wine red textile in the inner layer. The dress has two spaghetti straps.
sgcool_label_text: This is a black organza waisted slip dress designed by Singapore-born designer Benny Ong. The dress has a label “Design Room, Selfridges” and was likely stocked in Selfridges, one of London’s most reputable department stores, in the 1970s. Ong is one of the pioneer Singapore-born designers known for dressing royalty such as the late Princess Diana and for establishing his brand in London.
title_text: Black slip dress by Benny Ong
